snippet: Performances by Helena Basilova, with the New York University Symphony; Concertante, the flexible chamber group; and Pamela Frank at Bargemusic.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performances by Concertante at Merkin Concert Hall and by several chamber musicians, including violinist Pamela Frank, at Bargemusic; Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by the New York University Symphony Orchestra at Symphony Space.

byline.original: By VIVIEN SCHWEITZER and ZACHARY WOOLFE

lead_paragraph: Performances by Helena Basilova, with the New York University Symphony; Concertante, the flexible chamber group; and Pamela Frank at Bargemusic.
